Name: The Walking Dead: Episode 1: A New Day
Overview: The episodic experts at Telltale Games return, this time putting players in the middle of a zombie apocalypse based on the popular comic and television show The Walking Dead. This series differs from many other episodic games in that players have a limited amount of time to make their decisions, and the choices they make have permanent, lasting effects. Episode 1 -- "A New Day" finds gamers controlling accused murderer Lee Everett as he fights for survival, meets familiar characters, and makes decisions that affect the fate of others, including a young girl named Clementine.
